title: Add missing Toiletries category to store categories

requirements.text: Add a missing "Toiletries" category to the category list shown on the Store Home page (and fix spelling to "Toiletries" in user-facing text).
acceptanceCriteria: On the Store Home page, the "Shop by Category" grid includes a category labeled "Toiletries".
The new category renders consistently with existing category cards (icon + name + item count) and does not break the grid layout on mobile and desktop.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI components are read-only and must be composed).
Do not modify any paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Adding backend persistence or admin management for categories.
Adding category filtering/navigation behavior beyond displaying the missing category.
